ingredients: 3  ripe bananas, mashed, 1 cup white sugar, 1  egg,   +   1/4 cup melted butter, 1   +   1/2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1 teaspoon salt
nutrition: Total Fat 5g 7%, Saturated Fat 3g 16%, Cholesterol 31mg 10%, Sodium 399mg 17%, Total Carbohydrate 42g 15%, Dietary Fiber 1g 5%, Total Sugars 24g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 3mg 16%, Calcium 9mg 1%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 155mg 3%
